# <a name="fix-outlook-on-the-web-sync-issues"></a><span data-ttu-id="36f1a-102">修正網頁同步處理問題的 Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36f1a-102">Fix Outlook on the web sync issues</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36f1a-103">網頁型 Outlook 會顯示您用來連線到信箱的行動裝置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36f1a-103">Outlook on the web shows the mobile devices you use to connect to your mailbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36f1a-104">如果您無法再使用裝置，或裝置沒有正確同步，您可以從這個清單中刪除。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36f1a-104">If you're no longer using a device or a device isn't syncing properly, you can delete it from this list.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="36f1a-105">選擇</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36f1a-105">Choose</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="36f1a-106">**設定**  > **流覽所有 Outlook 設定**  > **一般**  > 行動**裝置**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36f1a-106">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **General** > **Mobile devices**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="36f1a-107">將游標移到清單中的裝置上，然後選取垃圾桶圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36f1a-107">Move the cursor over your device in the list, and then select the trash icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="36f1a-108">以刪除裝置合作關係。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36f1a-108">to delete the device partnership.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="36f1a-109">在視窗頂端，選取 [ **儲存**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36f1a-109">At the top of the window, select **Save**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="36f1a-110">移至行動裝置，並完全關閉電源。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36f1a-110">Go to your mobile device and power it off completely.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="36f1a-111">在幾秒鐘之後重新開機行動裝置，然後再次同步處理您的信箱。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36f1a-111">Restart your mobile device after a few seconds, and then sync your mailbox again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36f1a-112">若要深入瞭解，請參閱 [修正電子郵件同步處理的問題或從網頁上的 Outlook 移除設備信箱](https://support.office.com/article/775ed31c-05bd-4ee4-b1b3-33fad7b5b992)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36f1a-112">To learn more, see [Fix email sync issues or remove a device from your Outlook on the web mailbox](https://support.office.com/article/775ed31c-05bd-4ee4-b1b3-33fad7b5b992)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="36f1a-113">*附注：* 網頁版 Outlook 中已不再支援連線的帳戶。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36f1a-113">*Note:* Connected accounts are no longer supported in Outlook on the web.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="36f1a-114">若要深入瞭解，請參閱 [web 上的 Outlook 不再支援連線的帳戶](https://support.office.com/article/5cc526bf-e928-4a99-8b9f-5e089df7d887)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="36f1a-114">To learn more, see [Connected accounts are no longer supported in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5cc526bf-e928-4a99-8b9f-5e089df7d887)</span></span>
